name: Much Love, Catherine
description:
Much Love, Catherine is a game about imagination as a means of coping set in the late 19th century. Explore the metaphysical dungeons and discover the secrets of the Boston Psychiatric Ward.

Controls:

  • WASD - Move
  • Mouse - Look
  • E - Interact
  • Hold Tab - View Map
  • Scrollwheel - Scroll Text

Paul M. -- Programming, Game Design, Writing, Art, Music

Special thanks to:

Noah H.D., Jasper L. for playtesting and Luiz O.V. for his stone wall texture
